settings.title: Settings
settings.q1_title: How do I add a transaction?
settings.q1_answer: On the dashboard, click 'Add a transaction', fill in the details, and save. You can also use the 'Dictate' or 'Scan' buttons for quick entry.
settings.q2_answer: Go to the 'Budgets' section and set a limit for an expense category. The tracking will update automatically based on your transactions.
settings.q3_title: What is the 'Talk to Alice' chat for?
settings.q3_answer: It's a live financial coach. Ask it questions about your finances, for advice, or for summaries. The AI will respond vocally.
settings.contactText: If you need further assistance, feel free to contact us at
